2485e3fd-8b74-4d8a-ae5f-cebfc68d732d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2485e3fd-8b74-4d8a-ae5f-cebfc68d732d","title":{"en":"Apple Paradise"},"lastChapter":"6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"An extremely rare SF work that was never collected after serialization in Volumes 2-8 of Manga Kisou Tengai (マンガ奇想天外) in 1980-81. The manga would get collected in the Otomo Complete Works with its own volume. \n\nFrom amazon.jp:\nThis is a collection of works created by Katsuhiro Otomo between 1980 and 1981, when he was 26-27 years old. \n\nThe collection includes the title work, which was serialized across six chapters in the quarterly magazine “Manga Kisotengai” published by Kisotengai-sha, as well as four short manga, a one-shot manga, and an Anthology series consisting of 12 stories. The S F work “APPLE PARADISE,” a mystery set on a huge resource-mining spaceship that is about to return to Earth from a distant planet, was never collected into tankobon form as was the case with the previous volume “G,” but now all six chapters (approx. 120 pages/unfinished) have finally been collected. \n\nThe collection also includes the Wild West masterpiece “Memories of St. Bartholomew's Hill” and the complete “That's Amazing World” an anthology series based on fairy tales and literature. The short stories in the collection include two from “**SOS Greater Tokyo Exploration Team** (SOS Daitokyo Tankentai, SOS大東京探検隊)” (1996, Kodansha), first and fourth short stories from “**Her Thoughts...**(彼女の想いで…)” (1990, Kodansha), first and eighth short stories from “**Hansel and Gretel**” (1981, Sony Magazines), and one short story from ‘**GOOD WEATHER**’ (1981/Kitan-sha). \n\nThe short story “I・N・R・I” was changed to the right-hand side when it was first published in a book, but in this book, it was changed back to the left-hand side as in the original manuscript and read from the end of the book, and also reprinted in nishoku as it was first published in the magazine. In addition, the short story “ELECTRIC BIRD LAND,” which appeared in black and white in the tankobon, is reproduced for the first time in its original nishoku version as it appeared in the magazine.\n\n---\n- **Volume 7 of the OTOMO COMPLETE WORKS**"},"links":{"al":"93211","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/大友-克洋/dp/4065384346/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3MP3WX2D95L59\u0026dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.m4W2QS5PnvMkeYV8BsHH2b3TOWvBImM90ClNxT6PdHgKX-1Xt0GOlFBSx9487WYGmIDTWeIxOo3rd3uQh-plLcppxbDR4luDfIRddt_F0zgH1K547OuFNKByicjXRzpOSY0rLbEo6-HhuMDhICMgY2M7KBUjJ3JQwFRW_FHxC-d6QRG01spStTmGgeyOyyrageAdOHB6DEy-10M1V3rRWNGYSdo-8EpK1d6Q4p1G9BQvQlcqlBgzhDyNff2_Xcry2ZX4ctzPlMxuZZlcjKq-ReG2uRc5XfY77O5QWOrQYrVAVTsxAT482x0BlM9sf_17pSYEq-YSFJtaulr0GKDXIFos8slMn84ZOHoJe8A4LXa3igAIGh_cMUO7hj9pLKJWJFtiyWzm3ZAHq9quqiIXsHRhc5uy1BSPnn9HqPTgrN4.035BSUFf6-tFswwFkByBJbk7vdYLjNXkkXSUWRf3LpU\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=otomo+the+complete+works\u0026qid=1741383963\u0026sprefix=otomo+the,aps,438\u0026sr=8-1","ap":"apple-paradise","kt":"33323","mal":"81955","mu":"16524"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

Whether offering counsel to the Momotarou of Japanese folklore or receiving diplomatic missions from the Judeo-Christian Hell, the demon who runs the show from behind the king's imposing shadow is ready to beat down any challenges coming his way into a bloody pulp. Metaphorically, of course…  \n  \nThe poster boy for micromanagement and armed with negotiation skills worthy of Wall Street, Hoozuki no Reitetsu follows the sadistic and level-headed Hoozuki as he spends his days troubleshooting hell. With an abundance of familiar faces from popular Japanese legends and East Asian mythology working middle management positions, this referential and anachronistic dark comedy brings new meaning to the phrase \"employer liability.\" Just how hard could it be to manage employees from hell, anyway?\n___\n[Alt Official English (Koudansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/hozukis-coolheadedness/)\n\n[Official X Account](https://x.com/mogura_hozuki)"},"links":{"al":"66113","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CCXKVQ/","ap":"hozukis-coolheadedness","bw":"series/4479","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/123933/","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/779-hozuki-s-coolheadedness?utm_source=mgd","kt":"14049","mal":"36113","mu":"63783","raw":"https://morning.kodansha.co.jp/c/hozukinoreitetsu"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

Due to her family being extremely poor, money is everything to her. That's why she wants to step into the world of \"Keijo.\" \"Keijo\" is a type of gambling sport where girls stand on a small floating platform and compete against one another. The aim is to push the other contestant off of the platform into the water, but they are only allowed to use their butt or breasts to push the others off. Will Nozomi be able to compete in the intense world of \"Keijo\" and bring wealth and fortune for her family?  \n  \n[Author explains cancellation.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2017-04-26/keijo-manga-creator-explains-cancellation/.115353)  \n  \n[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18413)"},"links":{"al":"85929","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CGW6QT/","ap":"keijo","bw":"series/129135/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/217970/","kt":"16042","mal":"56505","mu":"101987"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

Oder wird sie ihrem tragischen Ende nicht entkommen können?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EB%A7%88%EB%85%80%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2447), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56113952)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29534)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Wali-Sang-Tiran-adalah-Penyihir-Jahat/213)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61053)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A9%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A/171)","en":"I seem to have reincarnated in the world of an R-rated romance fantasy novel. And not just as an ordinary character, but as the witch who loses her life to the crazy male lead! Luckily there is a long 200 years until the main characters are born and grow into their roles. Now since my life is not in imminent danger, shall I leisurely think of ways to avoid death?\n\nHowever, I had not taken notice of a very important detail about the time I'd be spending 'safe from imminent danger.' 200 years was by no means a short waiting period and by the time the younger version of the male lead appeared in front of me, I had completely forgotten the original novel's plot!\n\nOh, whatever, now that it's come to this, the only way to survive is to raise the male lead into a sane and stable adult! The first step to avoiding death by the hands of the tyrant male lead is changing this extremely frightened child's life.\n\n\"It must be very inconvenient for you to have me suddenly show up on your doorstep, I'm sorry. You can tell me to go away, I'll be fine.\"\n\n\"Nonsense. Do I look like someone who could be inconvenienced by a little boy like you? Also, what do you mean by you'll be fine even if told to go away? It's not like you have anywhere to go back to, kid.\"\n  \nThe little boy burst into tears.  \n  \n'Oh, this is so not it,' was what the witch thought to herself as the little boy sobbed.\n\n---\nClete's heart sinks when a little child shows up on her doorstep one day. The wide-eyed boy is none other than Alpen, the emperor's illegitimate son and her terrifying future killer. But as a powerful witch herself, Clete is not one to surrender to fate. She decides to raise him with warmth and kindness in the hopes that he will walk a different path in life this time. The only problem? She has no idea how to raise a human child! With the help of her loyal butler, she starts with the basics: reading him a storybook, playing house, making him a friend... The two eventually form a special bond that she never thought was possible. But when dark forces begin to interfere, it becomes harder and harder to keep the boy from succumbing to evil. Will Clete's powers be enough to alter the future? Or will she inevitably meet her tragic end?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EB%A7%88%EB%85%80%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2447), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56113952)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29534)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Wali-Sang-Tiran-adalah-Penyihir-Jahat/213)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61053)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A9%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A/171)","fr":"Lorsqu'elle ouvre sa porte pour y trouver un petit enfant, Clete en frissonne. Le garçon aux grands yeux innocents qui se tient devant elle n'est autre qu'Alpen, le fils illégitime de l'empereur, mais aussi celui qui finira par l'assassiner de sang-froid dans le futur. N'importe qui serait terrorisé, mais pas cette puissante sorcière qui décide alors de défier le destin. Clete prend donc une courageuse décision: elle va élever l'enfant avec douceur et gentillesse dans l'espoir qu'il ne deviendra pas un monstre cette fois-ci! Le plan semble parfait, à un détail près... elle n'a pas la moindre idée de comment élever un petit humain! Avec l'aide de son fidèle serviteur, Clete commence par les choses élémentaires: lui lire un conte, jouer avec lui, lui trouver un ami... Les deux finissent par tisser un lien qu'elle n'aurait jamais imaginé possible. Mais lorsque des forces obscures commencent à venir troubler leur quotidien, il devient de plus en plus difficile d'empêcher l'enfant de changer pour le pire. Les pouvoirs de Clete seront-ils suffisant pour changer le futur? Ou finira-t-elle par connaître une fin tragique malgré ses efforts?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** 주제에.”\n\n갑자기 꼬마가 울먹이기 시작했다.\n\n어라, 이게 아닌가?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** que reencarnei no mundo de um romance de fantasia com classificação inferior. E não apenas como um personagem comum, mas como a bruxa que perde sua vida para o protagonista louco! Felizmente, ainda demoram 200 anos até que os personagens principais nasçam e cresçam em seus papéis. Agora que minha vida não está em perigo iminente, devemos pensar vagarosamente em maneiras de evitar a morte? No entanto, eu não tinha notado um detalhe muito importante sobre o tempo que eu estaria gastando ‘protegida de um perigo iminente’. 200 anos não foi de forma alguma um curto período de espera e quando a versão mais jovem do protagonista masculino apareceu na minha frente, eu tinha esquecido completamente o enredo do romance original! Oh, que seja, agora que chegou a esse ponto, a única maneira de sobreviver é elevar o protagonista masculino a um adulto são e estável! O primeiro passo para evitar a morte pelas mãos do tirano líder masculino é mudar a vida desta criança extremamente assustada. \"Deve ser muito inconveniente para você me ver de repente aparecendo na sua porta, me desculpe. Você pode me dizer para ir embora, eu vou ficar bem.\" \"Absurdo. Pareço alguém que poderia ser incomodado por um garotinho como você? Além disso, o que você quer dizer com você ficará bem mesmo que mandado embora? Não é como se você tivesse para onde voltar, garoto.\" O menino começou a chorar. *Oh, não é isso.* Foi o que a bruxa pensou consigo mesma enquanto o garotinho soluçava.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EB%A7%88%EB%85%80%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2447), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56113952)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29534)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/tyrants-guardian-is-evil-witch-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Wali-Sang-Tiran-adalah-Penyihir-Jahat/213)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61053)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A9%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A/171)","ru":"Клетэ - злая ведьма, убитая обезумевшим главным героем. Ancak, “yakın tehlikeden korunmak” için geçireceğim zamanla ilgili çok önemli bir ayrıntıya dikkat etmemiştim.\n\n200 yıl hiçbir şekilde kısa bir bekleme süresi değildi ve erkek başrolün daha genç versiyonu karşıma çıktığında, orijinal romanın olay örgüsünü tamamen unutmuştum! Oh, her neyse, şimdi bu noktaya geldiğine göre, hayatta kalmanın tek yolu, erkek liderliği aklı başında ve istikrarlı bir yetişkine yükseltmektir!\n\nZorba erkek başrolün elinden ölümden kaçınmanın ilk adımı, bu aşırı derecede korkmuş çocuğun hayatını değiştirmektir. “Birdenbire kapınızın eşiğine gelmemin sizin için çok sakıncalı olmalı, üzgünüm. Bana gitmemi söyleyebilirsin, iyi olacağım.”\n\n“Saçmalık. Senin gibi küçük bir çocuktan rahatsızlık duyabilecek birine benziyor muyum?\n\nAyrıca, gitmen söylense bile iyi olacaksın derken neyi kastediyorsun? Geri dönecek bir yerin yok, evlat. ” Küçük çocuk gözyaşlarına boğuldu. “Ah, bu o kadar değil.” Küçük çocuk hıçkırırken cadının kendi kendine düşündüğü buydu.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** Later on, a new guy enters the scene and he's also interested in one of the 3 friends. Will he be able to win his heart?  \n  \n5) Love Plot (Rabu Purotto)  \nKichii, Akira and Akira's older brother are models for Boyfriend Grand Prix magazine. 2650a5bf-4e89-4eb9-9a54-ec8fdeee5c2b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2650a5bf-4e89-4eb9-9a54-ec8fdeee5c2b","title":{"en":"Countess and the Blade"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"명랑자매백서"},{"ko-ro":"Myeongrangja'mae'baegseo"},{"en":"Cheerful Countess Sisters"},{"de":"Die Gräfin und die Klinge"},{"fr":"La comtesse et sa sœur mercenaire"},{"ja":"明朗姉妹白書"},{"id":"The Lovely Sisters"},{"vi":"Nữ bá tước lạnh lùng và Cô em gái bá đạo"},{"zh":"伯爵姐妹的白皮书"},{"zh-hk":"開朗姊妹羅曼史"}],"lastChapter":"88","availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr","en","pt-br","ru"],"description":{"en":"Charlotte de Perol is a beautiful lady with a heartbreaking past. She has endured long years of abuse and threats from her mother while her father was busy chasing girls and wasting the family's fortune. But on the day of her grandfather's funeral, Charlotte becomes the countess instead of her father. Out of resentment, that cruel father locates his long forgotten daughter named Kara to steal the title back from her daughter Charlotte.\n\n---\nThe heart-racing and hot-blooded romances for sisters between the Ice Princess Charlotte and the strongest knight Kara!\n\nThe Count's lovely yet unfortunate granddaughter, Young Miss Charlotte. After her grandfather passes away, she inherits his entire fortune and title instead of her worthless father. That's how she thought her life was going to be in full bloom, but her father wouldn't let go of the inheritance and brings forward Kara, a younger sister she's never seen or heard of before…\n\n\"It's good that you've become a lady of the Perol household, and that I am able to share the inheritance.\"\n\nAnd in the midst of it all, she also has to deal with their King who's targeting her fortune by trying to force her into marriage with his own vassal! To Charlotte, who has to stand against all of these stupid troubles, Kara extends a hand.\n\n\"In situations like these, you should say that they're 'crazy bastards!' We will give you a lovely romance with high sugar content!\n\n+++**Volume 1 Contents:**\nCover Art: Hachibi ☆ Wan\n1. \"Akuyaku Reijou wa Nigedashitai\" (悪役令嬢は逃げ出したい; The Villainess Can't Escape; The Villainess Wants to Flee), Art by Fuyukusa Momo, Story by Akane Sumire, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9077ey/), [English Translation](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/the-villainess-wants-to-flee/): Reincarnated into the body of the villainess, Lucier, who is about to be engaged to the main capture target and crown prince, Leonhardt, can she escape her death flag?\n2. \"Konyaku Haki no go Riyou wa Keikakuteki ni\" (姫君は若き将軍に溺れる; The Princess Is Weak Towards the Young General), Art by Kitamura Shin, Story by Tachibana Itsuki, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0831fr/)\n3. \"Moujiki Otome Game no Hajimaru Kisetsudesuga, Mob no Watashi mo Taihendesu\" (もうじき乙女ゲームの始まる季節ですが、モブのわたしも大変です; The Otome Game's Season Will Begin, but It's Too Difficult for Me Who's a Mob), Art by Tsutsumi Hato, Story by Usui Katsura, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n6177em/)\n4. \"Himegimi wa Wakaki Shougun ni Oboreru\" (婚約破棄のご利用は計画的に; The Use of the Engagement Braking Was Planned), Art by Nekonomori Shima, Story by Ouya Saki, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2296ep/) | [PG Version](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4350gn/)\n+++\n+++**Volume 2 Contents:**\nCover Art: Hachibi ☆ Wan\n1. \"Kyuukoku no Kishi-sama Kara Etchina Kotoba ga Tomarimasen ~tsu\" (救国の騎士様からえっちな言葉が止まりませんっ, The Patriot Knight Won't Stop Seducing Me), Art by Potagi, Story by Mizuno Emu, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0765gi/)\n2. \"\"Kouri no Reijou to Honou no Ouji\" (氷の令嬢と炎の王子, The Ice Lady and the Flame Prince), Art by Harumi Tako, Story by Cider, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3023gr/)\n3. \"The Knight's Sweet Trap ~Aphrodisiac Won't Work on Me! (Maybe)~\" (騎士団長の甘い罠 ~私に媚薬はききません! (多分)~), Art by Shizuku, Story by Azagishi Kyuu, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n5060gh/)\n4. \"Akuyaku Reijou wa Nigerarenai\" (悪役令嬢は逃げられない; The Villainess Cannot Escape), Art by Fuyukusa Momo, Story by Akane Sumire, [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2246ez/), [English Translation](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/the-villainess-cannot-escape/)\n5. \"Danzai [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0293id/)\n+++","ja":"令嬢と魅力的な男性たちの溺愛ストーリーを集めた、ムーンライトノベルズ発アンソロジー! ラブ甘なRシーンがたっぷりの読み切り編を収録。ちょっぴり大人なラブロマンス、糖度高めでお贈りします♪\n\n+++**第1巻の内容：**\nカバーイラスト：八美☆わん\n1. 『悪役令嬢は逃げ出したい』　漫画：冬草もも　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9077ey/)：茜菫\n婚約破棄されるはずの王子から溺愛されてしまい……⁉\n2. 『姫君は若き将軍に溺れる』　漫画：猫乃森シマ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0831fr/)：逢矢沙希\n国を守るため幼馴染の将軍と結婚するはずが、いきなり初夜⁉\n3. 『もうじき乙女ゲームの始まる季節ですが、モブのわたしも大変です』　漫画：津々見はと　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n6177em/)：うすいかつら\n攻略対象である宰相の息子から、偽装結婚を持ち掛けられ⁉\n4. 『婚約破棄のご利用は計画的に』　漫画：北村シン　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2296ep/)：たちばな樹\n男爵令嬢を断罪した公爵令嬢は、忠実な護衛と愛を交わす――。\n+++\n+++**第2巻の内容：**\nカバーイラスト：八美☆わん\n1. 『救国の騎士様からえっちな言葉が止まりませんっ』　漫画：ぽたぎ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0765gi/)：水野恵無\n憧れの騎士兼侯爵から救国の褒美として自身を求められ!?\n2. 『氷の令嬢と炎の王子』　漫画：春海た子　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3023gr/)：サイダー\n辺境の氷姫は、前世で推していた“炎の王子\"に出会い――?\n3. 『騎士団長の甘い罠 ~私に媚薬はききません! (多分)~』　漫画：雫　[原作](https://xmypage.syosetu.com/mypageblog/view/xid/299643/blogkey/264669/)：浅岸 久\n媚薬を飲む試験に臨んだ男装騎士は、騎士団長に攻め立てられて!?\n4. 『悪役令嬢は逃げられない』　漫画：冬草もも　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2246ez/)：茜菫\n乙女ゲームで見た婚約破棄シーンのはずが、王子様が私を溺愛!?\n5. 『断罪された妹と人生チェンジしたのに、何故かヤンデレ夫がもれなくついてくるのですが。』　漫画：海月あると　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9647gf/)：イセヤレキ\n妹と中身が入れ替わっても、腹黒ドS王太子にはお見通し!?\n+++\n+++**第3巻の内容：**\nカバーイラスト:ウエハラ蜂\n1. 『春待の猫姫と白虎の旦那様』　漫画：喜久田ゆい　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0634gs/)：宮田紗音\n雪猫族の姫君は白虎の旦那様の“つがい\"に選ばれて……?\n2. 『私、辞退したいと思います。』　漫画：白旗サガリ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0535cw/)：みことかなめ\n王太子様の正妃候補を辞退するはずが…? 勘違いラブロマンス♡\n3. 『炎の王子と氷の令嬢』　漫画：春海た子　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0705gt/)：サイダー\n愛する王子の魔力暴走をその身で鎮める為、駆け付けた氷姫は--!?\n5. 『黒騎士を癒やした責任は誰にあるのか』　漫画：御巫 史　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0539gz/)：久万シロ\n黒騎士様を癒し続けた少女は、彼の溺愛に翻弄される――。\n+++\n+++**第4巻の内容：**\nカバーイラスト：ウエハラ蜂\n1. 『英雄の奥様』　漫画：サコ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n6951hc/)：鴻上るみ\n政略結婚で国の英雄に嫁いだはずが、旦那様から毎日溺愛されています!?\n2. 『一生愛さないと言われたので』　漫画：海原ゆた　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n8119ha/)：葬田なない\n愛しの公爵令息との既成事実を作るため、色仕掛けを決意したら……?\n3. 『お腹が痛いのでパーティーには行きません。なので断罪は後にしてください!』　漫画：KATINO　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n6077hg/)：ひと☆まる\n夢に現れた前世の自分に、王太子から婚約破棄される未来を告げられて!?\n4. 『うっかり助けた魔女の恩返しで、好きな人の元に自動で向かう魔法を靴にかけられ、彼に触れると発動する淫紋を刻まれた私に起こった椿事。』　漫画：広乃あずま　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1456hg/)：待鳥園子\n魔女を助けたら、恩返しに好きな人の元へ向かう魔法をかけられて――!?\n4. 『全力で悪役令嬢を演じようとしたら、ヒロインが男で隣国の王子でした』　漫画：ぽたぎ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3234ha/)：茅野ガク\n乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生したら、ヒロイン（♂）から執着されてしまい――!?\n5. 『婚約破棄されてムカついたので愚痴を聞いてくれた男とエッチしたら、年上の公爵様だった件。』　漫画：大野ナツ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n0234hp/)：狭山雪菜\n婚約破棄をされた帰り道で、声をかけてくれた男性に愚痴を聞いてもらったら…？\n6.
